title: TBB - Personal Project
description: I developed a computer-game application using the Python programming language on the video game development platform, PixelPad. This was my submission for the 47th Congressional District of California in the Congressional App Challenge of 2020.

title: Surplus Food 360 - Personal Project
description: I developed a web application to showcase surplus food availability from restaurants, addressing food wastage. I utilized the Atom text editor effectively to use programming languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This was my submission for the 47th Congressional District of California in the Congressional App Challenge of 2021.
